original_text: But the temple servants lived on Ophel; and Ziha and Gishpa were over the temple servants.
korean_text: 느디님 사람은 오벨에 거주하니 시하와 기스바가 그들의 책임자가 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: But the temple servants lived on Ophel
and Ziha and Gishpa were over the temple servants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 시하와 기스바는 성전 막일꾼들을 다스렸습니다
